long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A sidebar that adds a comment section to any webpage. Powered by reddit the comment section is moderated and sortable. It allows you to avoid scams and misinformation by looking at what others say about a website.

Instructions:
Simply click the Reco icon in the extensions bar and a comment section appears on the right side of your screen. If you would like to post a comment you will be prompted to login to Reddit. After accepting the prompt your comment will be posted.

If you have any questions or recommendations please email joshlordeveloper@gmail.com.
